name: Santa's rolling workshop
description:
Platforming/moving with a physics based ball trough a christmas themed world with some fun mechanics in a short experience for the secret santa gamejam.

Wasd/thumbstick to move

Spacebar/X/A button to jump

The file is 4gb's and is designed for windows.

I hope you enjoy it, I spent the last two weeks working on this, and while I didn't have enough time to create as much content as I wanted, I think level 1 is a fun experience :)
